forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A good deal of sunshine. High 12C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High 54F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 4C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening becoming a steady rain overnight. Low near 40F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 51F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 2C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low around 35F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 14C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 57F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 3C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 38F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 11C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 44F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 10C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 50F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 2C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 36F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the morning, becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 47F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 33F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 49F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 54F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.
